Class gameController

java.lang.Object
sample.gameController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class gameController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This controller controls gamepage.fxml view

    • initialize

      public void initialize​(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Sets the timeline to set cycles to indefinite and create an instance of ball and paddle.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - Location used to resolve relative paths for root objects
      resourceBundle - resouces used to localise the root object

    • startGame

      private void startGame()
      Add bricks to the gameframe, sets the milisecond per frame and set the animation timeline to start.

    • keyPressed

      public void keyPressed​(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent event) throws IOException
      Pauses,plays and starts game when space bar pressed. Moves Left when A is pressed. Moves Right when D is pressed. Opens console when SHIFT+ALT+F1 is pressed.
      Parameters:
      event - receives the keyCode
      Throws:
      IOException - Error on loading the .fxml file.

    • paddleKeyReleased

      public void paddleKeyReleased​(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent e)
      Stops paddle from continuing moving left or right after key is released.
      Parameters:
      e - receives keyReleased.
